attributes.action: Relocate Salisbury railway station more centrally with an integrated transport interchange.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rail station is currently on the edge of Salisbury, with difficult access, poor parking and lousy 'bus links etc. Under offical review is the future of the Central Car Park / (Sainsbury's) area, adjacent to the rail lines. This is where the rail station ought to be, with a full transport interchange, relocated bus station, parking etc.
